scripts.install: npm run clone && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:evmc && npm run build:evmone && npm run rebuild
scripts.build:evmc: mkdir -p libbuild; cd libbuild;mkdir evmc; cd evmc; cmake ../../evmc; cmake --build .
scripts.build:evmone: mkdir -p libbuild; cd libbuild;mkdir evmone; cd evmone; cmake -S ../../evmone -B . -DEVMONE_TESTING=OFF; cmake --build . --parallel
scripts.clone: npm run clone:evmc && npm run clone:evmone
scripts.clone:evmc: git clone https://github.com/ethereum/evmc.git; cd evmc; git reset --hard 18bea41
scripts.clone:evmone: git clone --recursive https://github.com/ethereum/evmone.git; cd evmone; git reset --hard d2de6b1; cd evmc; git reset --hard 18bea41
